name: Super Awesome Platformer!!!
description:
Super Awesome Game!!! is a short game that I made a prototype for.
It currently has 5 levels and all images in it are placeholders while I work on developing it into an awesome game.

It is my first actual game, so it's very basic, the gameplay of it is a basic platformer but you drag a little platform around and have to guide you, the player, to the end of the level.
